messageBody:
I was creating tests, when in any test I dont understand a behaviour
of the framework. The Junit framework executes Before and BeforeClass
test methods in reverse order. Why?

In TestIntrospector I find the below code, but I dont understand the
cause.

public List<Method> getTestMethods(
Class<? extends Annotation> annotationClass) {
...
if (runsTopToBottom(annotationClass))
Collections.reverse(results);
return results;
}

private boolean runsTopToBottom(
Class< ? extends Annotation> annotation) {
return annotation.equals(Before.class) ||
annotation.equals(BeforeClass.class);
}
